definition: to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)
to deliver/to carry/to give (as a present)/to present (with)/to see off/to send
band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

pinyin: xuan2 zhuan3 xing2 li5 chuan2 song4 dai4

sentences.english: They didn't apparently call it debugging.
These were damaging the conveyor bearings through the ingress of water and contaminants.
sentences.chinese: 这些都是破坏性的传送带轴承通过入水及污染物。

sentences.english: Blood spurted as the conveyer belt moved on.
sentences.chinese: 随著传送带向前移动，鲜血喷射出来了。

sentences.english: The conveyor system moves the tubes clockwise towards the cleaning and filling station.
sentences.chinese: 传送带系统以顺时针方向将管筒移动到清洁和填装站。
传送带可以正常工作吗？

sentences.english: This fan is leather belt type high-powered bibulous fan, weaving of the water that offer spray is special.
sentences.chinese: 本风机是传送带式高质量吸水风机，供喷水织布特用。

sentences.english: All coal was moved from the work face by electrically-driven conveyors.
sentences.chinese: 所有的煤都用电动传送带从工作面运出来。

sentences.english: e're faced with analyzing data as it passes by on a high-speed conveyor belt.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要在高速传送带传送来数据后立即进行分析。

sentences.english: The moving belt feeds raw material into the machine.
sentences.chinese: 传送带向机器输送原料。

sentences.english: Detailed design drawing for belt-conveyor system.
sentences.chinese: 传送带系统详细设计图。

sentences.english: I see our bags on the conveyor belt.
sentences.chinese: 我看见我们的包在传送带上了。

sentences.english: The loosened coal falls onto a conveyor for removal from the mine.
sentences.chinese: 松脱的煤块落到传送带上，被运出矿井外。

sentences.english: Belt conveyors with carrying idlers . Design recommendations.
sentences.chinese: 装有随动轮的传送带输送机。

sentences.english: Blood spurted as the conveyer belt moved on.
sentences.chinese: 随着传送带向前移动，鲜血喷射出来了。

sentences.english: My belongings go onto a conveyor belt, where they pass through an X-ray machine.
sentences.chinese: 我的物品上了传送带，接受X光扫描机检查。

sentences.english: At the far end of the room are several rows of short conveyor belts, waist high.
sentences.chinese: 在房屋的远端是数排传送带，齐腰高。

definition: aerial work platform (e.g. cherry picker or scissor lift)/lift/elevator
to load or unload/to transfer/to assemble and disassemble
